title: Ghost Stories
director: Zoya Akhtar, Dibakar Banerjee, Karan Johar
writer: Zoya Akhtar, Dibakar Banerjee, Niranjan Iyengar
short_cast: Janhvi Kapoor, Sobhita Dhulipala, Sukant Goel, Gulshan Devaiah, Mrunal Thakur, Avinash Tiwary, Vijay Varma, Sagar Arya, Surekha Sikri, Pavail Gulati
cast: Janhvi Kapoor, Sobhita Dhulipala, Sukant Goel, Gulshan Devaiah, Mrunal Thakur, Avinash Tiwary, Vijay Varma, Sagar Arya, Surekha Sikri, Pavail Gulati

desc: The directors of Emmy-nominated "Lust Stories" (Zoya Akhtar, Anurag Kashyap, Dibakar Banerjee and Karan Johar) reunite for this quartet of thrillers.
